function.description:
Extract exif tags from a single file and returns an *OBJECT* containing the tags and their values.
## Projection The projection parameter accepts an OBJECT containing exif tag names as keys and a boolean flag as a value. This value denotes whether or not the tag should be included in the result or not. Whenever you specify a tag in the projection all other tags will default to false.

example.title: Usage
example.header: Get all available tags on a file

function.tags: meta, data, metadata, exif, exiftool, exiftools
